About me.

I'm a web developer based in the beautiful city of Pune, India.

Currently a student of computer engineering, I enjoy turning complex problems into simple, efficient code. I'm passionate about learning new things and really interested in web security. When I'm not working, you'll find me playing football, reading a new book or exploring new places.
